descriptionlist.description:
Replaces the Dictation button with the Emoji key?
To customize how the tweak works, you must select the Emoji keyboard as one of the active keyboards in Settings> General> Keyboard.
Features: - Tap on the Emoji button (which now replaces the Dictation key) to go to the Emoji keyboard. - Press ABC / ABC on Emoji keyboard to return to the previous keyboard..
